title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry cannot be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. Therefore, all the resources that are being looked up are only relative to the location of the FontRegistry class, org.eclipse.jface.resource path. It can be remedied if FontRegistry takes a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter to the constructor.
OB: Currently, FontRegistry does not support the instantiation of resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource.
EB: Alternatively, it can allow clients to load their own resource bundle and pass it as a parameter to the constructor (instead of the name of the bundle).
SR: Modify the FontRegistry class to support the instantiation of resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource by taking a client class or class loader as an additional parameter to the constructor, or allow clients to load their own resource bundle and pass it as a parameter to the constructor.
